title: Air Horn Orchestra
detail: Like fine arrangements of music?  Want to bring them into the world for EVERYONE to hear?  We've got you covered.
extended_details:
Step one:  gather MIDI file of the world's finest compositions 

Step two:  gather a LARGE quantity of air horns

Step three:  adjust horns to emit various musical notes, all of which are beautiful

Step four:  attach all air horns to servos connected to a micro-controller

Step five:  convert MIDI files into servo instructions

Step six:  bless the air with the choir of the gods

Step seven:  profit

parts_and_costs.part: USB MIDI Cable Interface, OIBTECH Upgrade Professional MIDI to USB IN-
